title: iPhone Hardware Engineering Program Manager (India)
summary: The people here at Apple don’t just build products— they craft the kind of wonder that has revolutionized entire industries. It’s the diversity of those people and their ideas that encourage the innovation that runs through everything we do, from technology to environmental efforts.
description: Lead multi-functional development teams and drive issue resolution for product prototypes and various HW sub-systems like modules, Flex PCBAs, and PCBAs at engineering builds. Manage OEM/ODMs/build CM engineering teams to deliver quality service for engineering NPI activities. Be the primary point of contact with vendors and CM partners.
preferred_qualifications: Experience with portable consumer electronics devices is a plus. Program/Project management experience is a plus. OEM/ODM management experience is a plus. Mechatronics background is a plus.
education_experience: Minimum 4-5 years of industry experience. Excellent verbal and written interpersonal skills. Strong technical background in either EE or ME. B.Tech EE/CE/ME degree required, M.Tech desired.
